posts.post_content: I as looking for the above mentioned card in lower grade.  No rips, paper loss (except very minor to the back), writing or alterations including trimming.  I would like to keep my budget to $700 on the item.  Raw or graded, makes no difference.  Thanks for looking.
Green portrait Cobby was located, thanks to rman444.  Anyone with a bat-on to sell yet?
